data.text: The current issue of the Macedonian pharmaceutical bul-letin is a special edition of the Fifth Congress of Pharmacy ofMacedonia with International Participation.The following issue of Macedonian pharmaceutical bulletincontains abstracts accepted by the Scientific Committee forthe presentation at the Congress.Abstracts were printed in their original form as submittedby the authors, without language corrections, technical editingor retyping.Therefore, the layout doesn't meet the generally agreedupon standards required by the Journal.Authors are fully responsible for the content of the submit-ted articles.Ovoj broj na Makedonski farmatsevtski bilten e spetsijalenbroj na spisanieto posveten na Pettiot Kongres na farmatsijatana Makedonija so megjunarodno uchestvo.Vo spisanieto se opfateni apstraktite koi od Nauchniotodbor se prifateni za prezentatsija na Kongresot.Apstraktite se pechateni vo originalnata forma vo koja sedostaveni od avtorite, bez lektoriranje i dopolnitelno tekhnichkooblikuvanje ili prechukuvanje pa poradi toa ovoj broj tekhnichki gonema voobichaeniot standard na Makedonskiot farmatsevtskibilten.Avtorite se potpolno odgovorni za sodrzhinite na nivnitesoopshtenija.PREDGOVOR PREFACEDEAR HONORED GUESTS, INVITEDSPEAKERS, DELEGATES AND STUDENTS,On behalf of the Scientific and Organizing Committee it is a pleasure to welcome you toOhrid for the 5th Congress of Pharmacy in Macedonia with International Participation. Thecongress is organized as a joint activity of the Macedonian Pharmaceutical Association andFaculty of Pharmacy - Skopje as a quadrennial event since 1995.This year's conference promises to be our most exciting and rewarding one yet, since morethan 800 Pharmacist, among them scientists, educators, policy makers, professionals and thestudent community will be presenting and discussing some of the major opportunities andchallenges affecting the pharmaceutical profession, today.A great number of oral sessions and poster presentations will give both young and estab-lished scientists the opportunity to present their work and share ideas with colleagues on dif-ferent topics. The opening lecture and the interdisciplinary plenary lectures presented byopinion leaders in particular fields are designed to create starting point for a fruitful congressfor researchers, pharmacists and other health professionals. The scientific sessions that followwill start with opening lectures from a leading scientists in a particular field and will cover: I.Pharmaceutical Analysis / Quality Assurance / Regulatory Affairs, II. Pharmaceutical technologyand biopharmacy, III. Pharmacoeconomy / Social Pharmacy, IV. Clinical biochemistry / Toxicol-ogy / Food and nutrition, V. Medicinal aromatic plants, VI. Clinical pharmacy, VII. Pharmaceuti-cal chemistry / Biomolecular sciences. New trends in academia and education will be discussedduring the half day Academic session. Two Workshops organized within the Congress, one onmodern analytical techniques and one that will promote Regional ISPOR Chapter Macedoniawill further enrich the activities planned for health professionals and scientists interested inthose fields. The student session has a goal to introduce our students and other students fromthe region to experienced pharmaceutical and medical professionals, educators and scientists. Best oral and poster presentations, selected by a Special Congress Award Committee willbe awarded with prizes donated by our general sponsor.You are invited to submit extended papers for publishing in Macedonian PharmaceuticalBulletin immediately after the Congress. We are especially grateful to the dedication of the entire faculty and all other colleaguesand collaborators and our sponsors that have accepted to be a part of the Congress activitiesto ensure that this event is a successWe wish you a successful Congress in Ohrid!Regards,Chair of the Scientific CommitteeProf. Katerina GoracinovaChair of the Organizing CommitteeProf. Suzana Trajkovic Jolevska POChITUVANI GOSTI, POKANETIPREDAVAChI, DELEGATI I STUDENTI,Vo ime na Nauchniot i Organizatsionen odbor zadovolstvo e da Vi posakam dobredojdevo Okhrid na 5-tiot Kongres na farmatsevti vo Makedonija so megjunarodno uchestvo. Kongre-sot e organiziran od Makedonskoto Farmatsevtsko Drushtvo i Farmatsevtskiot fakultet -Skopje, kako nastan koj se odrzhuva sekoi chetiri godini pochnuvajkji od 1995 godina.Programata na ovogodineshniot Kongres e dokaz za postojaniot napredok i promotsijana ovoj nastan. Povekje od 800 delegati, megju niv i nauchnitsi, profesori, eksperti i stu-denti, kje prezentiraat i diskutiraat za glavnite mozhnosti i predizvitsi koi ja zasegaatfarmatsevtskata profesija.Golemiot broj na oralni i poster prezentatsii, kje im dadat mozhnost kako na mladitetaka i na iskusnite nauchnitsi da ja prezentiraat svojata rabota i megjusebno da razmenatidei na razlichni temi. Vovednoto predavanje i interedistsiplinarnite plenarni preda-vanja prezentirani od eksperti vo soodvetnite oblasti vetuvaat pochetok na uspeshna ra-bota na nauchniot del od Kongresot. Nauchnite sektsii koi sledat, kje zapochnat so vovednipredavanja od vrvni nauchnitsi vo: 1. Farmatsevtski analizi/ Obezbeduvanje na kvalitet/ Re-gulativa, 2. Farmatsevtska tekhnologija i biofarmatsija, 3.Farmakoekomija/Sotsijalna far-matsija 4. Klinichka biokhemija/Toksikologija/Khrana i iskhrana 5. Meditsinski aromatichnirastenija 6. Klinichka farmatsija 7. Farmatsevtska khemija/Biomolekularni nauki.Vo tekot na Akademskata sektsija, kje se diskutiraat novite trendovi vo naukata i ob-razovanieto. Vo ramkite na Kongresot kje se organiziraat dve rabotilnitsi. Prvata kje giobrabotuva sovremenite analitichki tekhniki, a vo vtorata kje se promovira regionalniotogranok na ISPOR, shto dopolnitelno kje gi zbogati aktivnostite planirani za zdravstve-nite rabotnitsi i nauchnitsite involvirani vo tie oblasti. Studentskata sektsija ima za tselda gi promovira nashite i studentite od regionot, vo profesionalnite, akademskite inauchnite krugovi. Najdobrite oralni i poster prezentatsii, odbrani od Komisijata za dodeluvanje na-gradi i priznanija, kje bidat nagradeni od nashite generalni sponzori.Po zavrshuvanje na Kongresot, gi pokanuvame avtorite da podnesat proshirena verzijana apstraktite vo forma na originalni nauchni trudovi vo Makedonskiot FarmatsevtskiBilten. Osobeno sme blagodarni na posvetenosta na kolegite od Farmatsevtskiot Fakultet -Skopje, site ostanati sorabotnitsi kako i na nashite sponzori, koi prifatija da bidat delod aktivnostite na Kongresot. Vi posakuvame uspeshen Kongres vo Okhrid!So pochit,Pretsedatel na Nauchniot odborProf. D-r. Katerina GorachinovaPretsedatel na Organizatsionen odbrorProf. D-r.
